trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Plymouth
There were no other sightings in Plymouth on or around November 30th 2007
divs: sighting detailswe drove onto morse rd. when we saw 2 shiny orange spheres being stationary above very tall pine trees on the left side of the road. they did not look like a cell phone tower. we stopped to gaze in amazement at them. then one "gave birth" to a third sphere. the new\ 3rd sphere slid to the left of the first sphere. there were 3 spheres on a very cold & clear evening. we drove on down the road, saw some extravagant holiday lights and retuned to the same spot later to find them gone. maybe 10 min. or less had passed. this was our first ufo sighting.
Summary: The 3 shiny, orange spheres created no sound above the tall pine trees.
